title: Old type of font
content:
Hi, this is the old logo of the company where I´m working. This year they are 30 years and we want to show some history but this is the only sample of the logo I could find, I need to recreat it.. Can you help me?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [muestra (2).jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125052/http:/typophile.com/files/muestra%20(2).jpg) | 129.23 KB |
author: jennyd_jd

comments.content:
Since it's a logo I expect there were changes from the original font. This is in the Bauhaus style and you could check [Blippo & similar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125052/http:/www.identifont.com/list?3+Blippo+0+23X+1+CFR+1+3V0+1+5Z4+1+1MU+1+3GX+2+8YS+2+M2Q+2+A5L+2+LZQ+2+2DPC+4+259D+4+OFX+4+OVA+4+P1T+4+NHR+4+ILY+4+77J+4+6IO+4+N7+4+6CV+4+F3R+4+51D+4+KJ3+4+MWH+4+68L+4+77Q+5+3CE+5+3UJ+5+3UL+5) for something to modify.  
There may be something closer, but it would perhaps be more effort to track it down than to start from Blippo or similar.  
Don
Thanks Don! I think you are right and is more easy modify the Blippo... Thanks again...
